description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nEmpowered Bone Spear:
At the start of battle, this creature gains [icons,1984]Bone Spear. When this creature {ACTION_casts} this spell, it {ACTION_casts} 1 additional time and ignores 50% of the target's {STAT_defense}.
name: Impaler Doll
